mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_generals (user_id, template_id, unlocked, activated, level, tier, current_hp, max_hp, rest_turns, capacity, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{templateId}, #{unlocked}, #{activated}, #{level}, #{tier}, #{currentHp}, #{maxHp}, #{restTurns}, #{capacity}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE user_generals SET unlocked = #{unlocked}, activated = #{activated}, level = #{level}, tier = #{tier}, current_hp = #{currentHp}, max_hp = #{maxHp}, rest_turns = #{restTurns}, capacity = #{capacity} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ug.*, gt.name AS name, (gt.base_atk + (ug.level - 1) * 10) AS atk, gt.speed AS speed, st.name AS skill_name, st.description AS skill_desc FROM user_generals ug LEFT JOIN general_template gt ON gt.template_id = ug.template_id LEFT JOIN user_general_skill ugs ON ugs.general_id = ug.id LEFT JOIN skill_template st ON st.skill_id = ugs.current_skill_id WHERE ug.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM user_generals WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND template_id = #{templateId}
